commands: OUT="$(TMPDIR=/tmp mktemp -t pyinfra.XXXXXX)" &&  MODE="$(stat -c %a /home/someone/something 2>/dev/null || stat -f %Lp /home/someone/something 2>/dev/null)" && OWNER="$(stat -c "%u:%g" /home/someone/something 2>/dev/null || stat -f "%u:%g" /home/someone/something 2>/dev/null || echo $(id -un):$(id -gn))" && awk '/# BEGIN PYINFRA BLOCK/,/# END PYINFRA BLOCK/ {next} 1' /home/someone/something > $OUT  && mv "$OUT" /home/someone/something  && chown "$OWNER" /home/someone/something  && chmod "$MODE" /home/someone/something
